name: Variable Speed Pool Pump Rebate
description: $100 rebate for ENERGY STAR variable speed pool filtration pump with qualifying controller
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power offers rebates for Santa Clara residents who upgrade to energy-efficient variable speed pool pumps, reducing electricity consumption for pool maintenance.
whatTheyOffer:
- $100 rebate for pool pump upgrade
- Must be ENERGY STAR certified
- Variable speed pump required
- Qualifying controller included
- Significant energy savings over single-speed pumps
- Lower pool maintenance costs
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Purchase ENERGY STAR variable speed pool pump
3. Ensure pump has qualifying controller
4. Have pump professionally installed
5. Apply online through SVP rebate platform
6. Submit proof of purchase and installation
